MASTER.DAT not found.

Even after I've pointed it to C:\FALLOUT\master.dat in the config. Oh well.
you need the Fallout2 master.dat not the first I guess

Also do not forget to connect DAT files from original Fallout 2 (copy them to client's folder or select their location in configuration utility FOConfig.exe) and to copy music in folder client\data\sound\music.

http://www.fonline.ru/forum/showthread.php?t=6221

to play thus you need install original F2 and copy master.dat and critter.dat from there into the client directory.
well...looks like Fallout...acts like Fallout...sounds like Fallout. We should supose it's Fallout =)
have a nice travel and be prepared to meet numerous PK's...

Hate to say it, but right now it is garbage. 

COmbat doesn't feel like original fallout, there is no balance at all, game has ridiculously long timeouts for simple actions. 

It doesn't even feel like "beta", more like "alpha".

Making fallout online is a great idea, but right now implementation is horrible and I can't think about any reasonable excuse for that.

^
